content: requires a **double-end hook** this pattern is easily adjustable to any head size or yarn/hook choice the website provides many pictures to help you along the way added aug 10 2010 a new finishing technique located at the bottom of the webpage that is a bit less visible than the previous method if you like this pattern you may wish to check out mio s scarf 1 check out this video on how to make this https //youtu be/iuqyk1aeppy si=uqqpslptrqtdwkx_ 1 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/mios-scarf
